channel.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee
channel.description: A virtual British pub with a Midwest flavor is the place for news, views, and audio from the Chicagoland area. Presented by Landlord, Phil Clark (aka USBrit) and co-host cellar-master, Mike Lingafelter (aka Lingo). Nominated for 2007 Podcast Awards, Best General Podcast. A great place for a chat!

image.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee

channel.itunes:subtitle: Pub chat from The Brit and Yankee located somewhere in Chicagoland
channel.itunes:summary: A 'virtual' British pub with a Midwest flavor. Pub chat from The Brit and Yankee located somewhere in Chicagoland, presented by Phil Clark (aka USBrit) and co-host Mike Lingafelter (aka Lingo) who invite you to stop by for a pint at The Brit and Yankee. A magazine-style show, nominated for 2007 Podcast Awards, Best General Podcast.
channel.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 90
item.description: "USBrit and Lingo are getting canned in this edition. We try three of the many craft beers to be now found in cans. This was recorded before Memorial Day but we couldnt get it published for one reason and another, which will be revealed in our next episode!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 89
item.description: "USBrit and Lingo invite you to another pubcast, this time with reviews of Rogue's Irish Lager and another Green Flash offering. Plus the Midwest is exporting eels to the Queen! Cheers!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 88
item.description: "We're adding a new item to the pub menu, so join the staff of the Brit and Yankee in the kitchen and at the BBQ grill. And there is a birthday call to a special guest and we also hear from USBrit's grandkids, plus a couple of beer reviews. Another packed show!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 87
item.description: "Zombie Beer this week and Lingo seems to be taking a liking to brains! A visit from a friend and some nice beverages all the way from Portland Oregon, courtesy of the lovelty Sam (Lingo's better half!) Oh and our list of beers to get started on for our lovely listener, Scott Loose. Cheers!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 86
item.description: "We are out of the pub again and visiting a new craft beer oasis called the Gammon Coach House in Batavia, IL. It's charity beer trivia night in aid of the United Way, and we find out that we really have no clue! Join us for some great fun, and please pardon the sound quality!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 85
item.description: "Ever thought of becoming a certified Beer Judge? In this special pubcast we talk with Mark Naski, a fully-certified beer judge, about what it takes to achieve this, and we pick up some tips on how to taste beer and identify the characteristics. Then we test our skills on a home brew from the lads at the Vandenbosch Brew Club. Tune in and learn the basics with USBrit, Lingo, and their guests."
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 84
item.description: "All the beer news that is the news, with an exciting announcment from Two Brothers. Plus, Lingo's wife supplies beer to sample and mine visits the pub. So stop by and enjoy a beer with all your friends for another social hour at the pub!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 83
item.description: "First show of 2012 and its packed here at the pub. We are tasting Green Flash beers and a special Sam Adams. We also look at 10 Health Reasons to drink beer...Really! Drink up and cheers!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 82
item.description: "Merry Christmas from all the staff at The Brit and Yankee. We celebrate this year with Christmas Ales and a couple of special guests. Christmas sing-alongs in the pub as well!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 81
item.description: "A pre-Thanksgiving pubcast which you will not get till AFTER Thanksgiving...we have to eat our turkey you know!! In this edition we talk about home brewers Vandenbosch and their award winning Hoppy Porter. And tell you how to make a reusable keg from a one-use keg. Gobble gobble gobble!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 80
item.description: "A special edition this time round where USBrit and Lingo are out visiting a brand new, local brewery club who have already won awards and could be the next big thing! Mike and Mark from the Vandenbosch Brewery show the lads how and where it is all done...oh, we do sample the beer as well. Thumbs up!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 79
item.description: "We're back in the Pub and we're chatting about everything and nothing again! And we are sampling two beers that are the Cellar-master's choice...and one may be brewed with a questionable substance! And for Anglophile foodies, we talk about British Condiments that have been mainstays for many a year. Cheers!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 78
item.description: "This pre-Labor Day edition pubcast has The Brit and Yankee team reporting from the inaugural Midwest Brewfest, held in Plainfield, Illinois. This is the second of our summer beer-fest specials, and in this one we sample the fun and excellent brews that can be found around the Chicago area, and across Illinois. Oh, by the way, at this one we are VIPs!! Woo Hoo!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 77
item.description: "We report from the inaugural Wheaton Alefest. Beers, interviews, and we find out we really are Beer Dummies. Music from the always-excellent Squeezettes, and of course our opinions on the beers we tasted!! Enjoy!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 76
item.description: "Have we got a banger for you in this episode! We taste the great British Banger, as supplied by Spencers Jolly Posh Foods and we have an interview with propietor Nick Spencer. And they're from Chicago as well!! Cheers!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 75
item.description: "Beers named after trains, home-brewed beers produced by Sam Adams, and a date you need to save in August!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 74
item.description: "Back in the pub and we have phone guests! We talk pastys with Gene from the Pasty Oven, and welcome back brewmaster Dave G to talk brewing. And of course we sample a couple of brews you might like to try yourself!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 73
item.description: "Recorded live from Two Brothers TapHouse, we are thwarted in our search for Sour Ale, but still have a good catch-up natter over a super frosty beverage. One of our quicker episodes - hooray says the crowd!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 72
item.description: "A bumper edition this time round as we haven't been in the pub for a while, and this time we are live from Lingo's cellar. We've gone dark this edition with three lovely brews to tantalize your tastebuds. Plus we are joined by Duff the Budgie, talk Mammoth Caves and Starbucks raves, and try a live stream while we record!! Please listen in sensible portions!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 71
item.description: "In this show we talk about Lingo's ancestors; it's our version of Roots. Our beer this week originates from the Sherwood Forest Brewery...but this time in the USA. Plus the interview that never was! And a welcome note for soccer fans..."
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 70
item.description: "An early touch of the green as Lingo and USBrit go out for breakfast at McNallys Irish Pub in St. Charles. We taste the Irish Breakfast, talk about soccer, talk to the owner Maurice McNally, and of course sample some Guinness! Slante!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 69
item.description: "In this show we test a couple of excellent frosty beverages, plus we talk about the Roku media player and how you can get the Brit and Yankee pubcast via the Roku Blubrry channel. Oh and I nearly forgot...its Lingos birthday!!! Woo Hoo!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 68
item.description: "Merry Christmas from the staff of The Brit and Yankee! This pubcast tastes the new limited edition from Sam Adams and the Weihenstephan breweries, plus we have our exclusive Chat with Chas, of UK's Chas N Dave. All this and our traditional Brit and Yankee production of The Night Before Christmas!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 67
item.description: "Another BUMPER edition this time round, and it's all about USBrit! We hear a summarized version of his Top Ten List from Top of The Pods, and visit the Oskar Blues Brewery in Colorado. All this with NO beer, just coffee. Why no beer? Tune in and find out!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 66
item.description: "We're doing two pubcasts in quick succession to cover us over the Thanksgiving Holidays. Today we taste a different beverage and a classic beer. And a special guest on this pubcast takes to America's favorite National Park, Yellowstone!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 65
item.description: ""
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 64
item.description: "One month later...in this episode we enjoy Indian Summer on Lingo's deck and sample Fall beers with some friends. Lingo reports in by phone this week, we chat about lots of stuff, and USBrit introduces their new exit theme, thanks to Chas N Dave!!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 63
item.description: "We are back in the pub today and have installed mics and and mixer! We're talking about a few Beer news items, and tasting some seasonal beers. Enjoy!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 62
item.description: "A packed show this time; there's beer sampling of course, we talk about British TV shows, widescreen TV advice, and a guest appearance on Snyde Remarks Radio with WLS on-air personality Wendy Snyder and her hubby, radio producer Jimmy Mac. Cool!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 61
item.description: "A Bumper Edition! We let ourselves chat on for a while in this one. Two interesting beers get reviewed, and we talk about Snyde Remarks podcast. Also, we announce a free t-shirt giveaway. It's a long one, so listen in two parts if you want!!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 60
item.description: "On the road with The Brit and Yankee, we visit our Brewmaster Dave G for a celebratory party. We chat in the our mobile studio, and pay a visit to the Mars Cheese Castle on the way home. Ya hay dere!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 59
item.description: "A slightly toasted USBrit and a sober Lingo get together to celebrate the July 4th holiday weekend. They taste a variety of lighter dark-style beers for a change of summer pace, and chat Vuvuzelas and Lingo's humanitarian efforts down in New Orleans."
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 58
item.description: "We've been tardy publishing this edition as we have been busy with grandkids and school stuff! So here it is - a road trip report by Lingo on some less than stellar beers he found in Georgia!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 57
item.description: "A Pubcast special this time! A report from Mother England when USBrit takes a country walk across the South Downs with his good friend and fellow podcaster, Richard Vobes. And of course, they end up in pub!!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 56
item.description: "The second of our Brit and Yankee Spring Break Specials. We take a look at another Chicago brewer's offering, this time from the Dark Side. Does this brew make us happy...listen and find out!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk

item.title: Pubcast from The Brit and Yankee-Show 55
item.description: "A Brit and Yankee Spring Break Special. We review a brand new hoppy offering from a local Chicago brewery that has a touch of French about it. Find out if we will buy it again or keep our money in our pocket!"
item.author: usbrit@thebritandyankee.com
item.itunes:keywords: Podcast, British, Pub, Talk, Midwest, Chicago, Comedy, Anglophile, England, English, Beer, Talk
